title: Hidden Gem Alert
author: Sarah M.
transcript: The secret menu at this cafe is amazing. Ask for the 'Traveler's Brew' - they only make it for people who know. Trust me on this one!

title: Local Story
author: Kenji T.
transcript: This corner has the best sunset view in all of Tokyo. Come here at 6pm, grab a konbini beer, and just... breathe. Pure magic.

title: Safety Tip
author: Maya R.
transcript: Heads up - the alley behind this building looks sketchy but it's actually a shortcut to the best izakaya. Totally safe!

title: Photo Spot
author: Alex K.
transcript: Pro tip for photographers - come here at 4am. You'll have the whole place to yourself and the light is absolutely incredible.
